## filter() function

Asynchronously filter the values in an array.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function filter<T>(array: T[], callback: (value: T, index: number, array: T[]) => Observable<boolean>): Observable<T[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>T[]</code> |  |
|  callback | <code>(value: T, index: number, array: T[]) =&gt; Observable&lt;boolean&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Observable<T[]>`
